channel.title: Script that will cause lag
channel.description:
I need a script that will, when a specified window is closed, lag my computer until a password is typed at random. I mean by 'at random', at any moment while the script is running, if i type the letters "P-A-S-S-W-O-R-D" in consecutive order the script will terminate.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Script that will cause lag
item.dc:creator: @dave5534 dave5534
item.description:
@dave5534 wrote:

theres a problem you can type the password in any order

Read full topic

item.title: Script that will cause lag
item.dc:creator: @Piratos Piratos
item.description:
@Piratos wrote:

i can make this if u really want it…

[size=20pt][color=red]!!! WARNING !!!
befour ur executing this script SAVE everything u have because they will most likely be closed!!!
IM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANYTHING THAT THIS SCRIPT MAY CAUSE! IT SHOULD ONLY LOCK UR MOUSE!
TYPE: password , to make it stop!

program New;
var x,y:integer;

procedure tiltmouse;
begin
clickmouse(x,y,true)
end;

function Password: boolean;
begin
   if iskeydown('p')then
      begin
        repeat
         wait(10)
         tiltmouse;
        until(iskeydown('a'))
         repeat
          wait(10)
          tiltmouse;
         until(iskeydown('s'))
          repeat
           wait(10)
          until(iskeydown('s'))
           Repeat
            wait(10)
            tiltmouse;
           until(iskeydown('w'))
            repeat
             wait(10)
             tiltmouse;
            until(iskeydown('o'))
             repeat
              wait(10)
              tiltmouse;
             until(iskeydown('r'))
              Repeat
               wait(10)
               tiltmouse;
              until(iskeydown('d'))
              Result:= true;
end;
end;

begin
 repeat
  tiltmouse;
  writeln('*Key is down*')
  tiltmouse;
 until(Password)
 writeln('Password had been typed')
Terminatescript;
end.

Read full topic
